extendedInfo.description: Songs & Dragons make it easy to introduce music on your games by using the portability of a phone or a tablet and the convenience of a touch screen. Create scenes and events and activate and deactivate them with a single touch. Say goodbye to bringing a cumbersome laptop to your game table when all you need is at the touch of a finger.WARNING: This app DOES NOT come with preloaded audio or image files. It is a tool to organize and use YOUR collection, the donation version comes with a link to download some files to help get you started. More info bellow.Some advanced features include: - Copying events between scenes; - Doing a backup from your scenes and events, so you can change your ROM or device without the fear of losing all your work; - Multi-selection of audio files, with the ability to preview them while searching; - Looping events with random wait times between them, to create a very natural feeling; - The Stage, allowing you to play up to five scenes at once; - Global events, common to all scenes; - Background playing, so you can check that PDF without fear of the app being killed by the android system; - UI that feels and looks Android; - Rich notifications (only supported on 3.0+); - Tablet and ICS-optimized.A small guide on how to use the app with screenshots, can be seen here: http://bit.ly/18RFDw9Songs & Dragons does not contain any sounds, images or any kind of database. It is merely a tool to help you organize your own library and easily use it during gameplay.This app will be free and ad-free forever! But if you want, you can get the donate version which, apart from making the developer a little bit closer to his plan of world domination, comes with a link for downloading a .zip file containing copyright-free images and audio. More details on its own page.Permissions: - Write to SD card: to save the backup file. - Internet: used for bug reporting. More info: http://bit.ly/13zhJwETranslation credits: - German: Jan Klinge (www.halbtagsblog.wordpress.com) - French: Adrien GourionHappy gaming and don't forget to cast your magic missiles... at the darkness!Keywords: rpg soundmixer dungeons dragons d&d daemon white wolf storyteller gurps das schwarze auge dsa the dark eye soundboard pen and paper

reviews.title: Always improving
reviews.comment: Needs a majestic dragon mascot, singing and playing an instrument, then 5 stars.
reviews.author: Rac Zoon

reviews.title: Great concept!
reviews.comment: When everything is going smoothly, it\'s a godsend... though there have been hiccups. Thought: Why is it that every app has to spoon-feed people nowadays? Part of tabletop is putting the effort in to create ambiance, not using canned sounds over and over. Be creative! Go forth into the interwebs and discover your own unique sound combos instead of just complaining that someone hasn\'t bundled it up and given it to you already.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems like it would be cool. But it said package file invalid when I downloaded it. HTC EVO 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not perfectly easy to use but useful
reviews.comment: It really added good atmosphere in our last DnD session. It\'s a bit complicated to get used to but I certainly does it\'s job well during play. Volume control could be improved for events.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problematic but good
reviews.comment: It does what it does well enough, but it\'s very buggy and unpolished. I\'ve had this app crash from rotating my phone, and from poking a volume button accidentally when the screen was off.  The UI itself is unintuitive and hard to use effectively, but it does what it says it does just fine with only a little work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: This is a great idea and would  be a good app. if it actually worked!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So fantastic, I can only add one thing.
reviews.comment: Real time volume control for events would be great. First, setting the volume as you create the events is guess and check. Second, I would like to be able to turn rain volume down slightly when the players enter a building or such.
reviews.author: Brian Francisco

reviews.title: No installed music
reviews.comment: This application may inspire someone to make an actual useful and easy to use RPG application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very intuitive
reviews.comment: I might just be me, but I am not finding this app very intuitive.  I have tried adding my music, but out won\'t list.  Also, it may be good to remind user of long hold features.  This app needs work.
reviews.author: Mark Drejza

reviews.title: Wish there was a black theme
reviews.comment: I\'m using this for Call of Cthulu roleplaying, but the white theme is kinda off..  I wish there was an option for a full screen background and black theme with white borders and text.    I\'d gladly donate if this was implemented.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rg
reviews.comment: Nice software I like it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No sound files included
reviews.comment: Kind of defeats the purpose if I have to go track down all those sounds myself. Kind of a let down
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: If I wanted to pick and choose the music personally ill just play the radio or something off my computer, not add another music player program to what I already have
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very promising.
reviews.comment: Better than what I used back in the day when I GMed regularly. If it also had a dice box and some system for randomly selecting things from tables, it would be the best mobile GM aid ever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shows potential, but is unstable
reviews.comment: This app has a lot of potential, and if it worked flawlessly, i would wholeheartedly reccomend it. However, it dosnt run very well on my ZTE light tablet (android 2.2). It seems that the sounds \"choke\" and stop playing when i\'ve switched scenes a few times. Events stall too, and no sound comes out.   If one could fix theese issues, it would be grand. i\'ll try and file some reports
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Magical
reviews.comment: Fantastic way to build atmosphere for your adventures. I use sounds from Zedge cause it is so easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No database
reviews.comment: If I have to go find all the audio files for myself, then it defeats the purpose of this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, but crashes often on my Droid 2
reviews.comment: I really like the app in general. Good user interface and layout. My only problem is that it force closes quite often on my Droid 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The only thing missing is a way to transition the scenes without stopping playback. Otherwise, an awesome app, exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nah
reviews.comment: Agree with other reviews.  This app is for organizing your sounds.  This is just another step added to the difficulty of bringing sounds into a game.
reviews.author: A Google User
